articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Ki Ryong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Ki Ryong
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Thursday sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Ki Ryong, member of the editorial board of Rodong Sinmun who is winner of Order of Kim Il Sung and the Order of Kim Jong Il, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Joint Statement of DPRK and Malaysia
articles.content:
Joint Statement of DPRK and Malaysia
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Delegations from the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) and Malaysia issued a joint statement on Thursday. The statement is as follows:
					1. Delegations from the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) and Malaysia recently held a meeting in Kuala Lumpur to resolve issues arising from the death of a DPRK national in Kuala Lumpur on 13 February, 2017.
					
					2. Both countries reaffirmed their desire to resolve the existing issues, based on the fundamental strength of their bilateral relations, which have been cultivated since the diplomatic relations were established in 1973.
					
					3. Both countries agreed on the importance of respecting the Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations, and full implement the provisions contained therein.
					
					4. As the DPRK has produced all necessary documentations related to the body of the deceased from the family, Malaysia agreed to facilitate the transfer of the body to the family of the deceased in DPRK.
					
					5. Both countries agreed to lift the travel ban imposed on citizens of the other country and guarantee their safety and security within their respective territory. This would allow the nine Malaysians presently in Pyongyang to return to Malaysia and the DPRK citizens in Kuala Lumpur to depart Malaysia.
					
					6. The importance of bilateral relations was reaffirmed. In this connection, both countries agreed to positively discuss the re-introduction of the visa-free system and work towards bringing the relations to a higher level.

articles.title: Remodeled Korean Revolution Museum Opened
articles.content:
Remodeled Korean Revolution Museum Opened
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean Revolution Museum successfully remodeled as a great center for education in the revolutionary traditions was opened Thursday with due ceremony.
					 The museum, which compressively deals with the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, functions as an ideological and spiritual mainstay for the army and people of the DPRK and the greatest national treasure of Kim Il Sung's Korea to glorify the revolutionary idea and exploits of the great leaders forever and hasten the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Standing at the museum are the color statue of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Thousands of more historic data and relics bearing witness to the tradition and history of the Korean revolution that has covered the path of victory and glory under the guidance of the great leaders are displayed according to contents and periods. More than 100 rooms are arranged with tens of thousands of historic materials and relics showing the revolutionary careers and feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu in a historical and comprehensive manner.
					
					 The visual effect and three-dimensional character of exhibits including newly manufactured boards and models are ensured, the form of display and lighting effect are on a high level and historic events and facts in relevant periods are depicted through semi-panoramic pictures.
					
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Ro Tu Chol and other leading officials of the party, the state and the army, officials of party, armed forces organs, the Cabinet, power organs, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, and party and power organs and industrial establishments in the city, officials of the units who took part in the remodeling project, builders and officials and employees of the museum.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), member of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants went round various rooms of the museum, being briefed on it.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography and Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Hungary
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, (the Day of the Sun), posted on its website on March 21 the brief biography of Kim Il Sung and "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People", the work of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il during their lifetime.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly preserving and glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Parties of Russia and CIS
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Parties of Russia and CIS
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received gifts from the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Communist Party of Belarus, the Ukrainian Communist Party, the People's Communist Party of Kazakhstan, the Communist Party of Pridnestrovye and G. A. Zyuganov, chairman of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					 The gifts were conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Thursday by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation and head of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma who is leading the visiting joint delegation of political parties from Russia and the Commonwealth of Independent States.
					
					 On the same day, Kazbek Taysaev presented a gift to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russia Presents Books to Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Russia Presents Books to Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The joint delegation of political parties from Russia and the Commonwealth of Independent States on a visit to the DPRK and the Russian embassy here presented books to Kim Il Sung University, with due ceremony at its e-library on Thursday.
					 Present there were Ri Kuk Chol, first vice-president of the University, officials concerned and the joint delegation led by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is head of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, Russian Ambassador Alexandr Matsegora and his embassy officials.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A joint delegation of political parties from Russia and the Commonwealth of Independent States led by  Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is head of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They made bows before the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 The delegation went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display, and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Leaves for Bangladesh
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Leaves for Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) led by Deputy Ri Jong Hyok, director of the National Reunification Institute, left here Thursday to take part in the 136th Conference of the Inter-Parliamentary Union to be held in Bangladesh.

articles.title: 4th Plenary Meeting of 8th C.C., UAWK Held
articles.content:
4th Plenary Meeting of 8th C.C., UAWK Held
Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The 4th plenary meeting of the 8th Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) took place here on Thursday.
					 Members and officials of the UAWK Central Committee participated in the meeting.
					
					 The meeting discussed an organizational issue.
					
					 At the meeting, Chairman Ri Myong Gil was relieved of his post and Kim Chang Yop was elected chairman of the UAWK Central Committee.

articles.title: Briefing on Situation Given for Diplomatic Envoys Here
articles.content:
Briefing on Situation Given for Diplomatic Envoys Here
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Thursday gave a briefing for diplomatic representatives of different countries and international organizations here on the present acute situation prevailing in the Korean peninsula due to the aggressive joint military drills and hideous "special operation" by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces. 
					 Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, referred to the present situation of the Korean peninsula and the DPRK's principled stand.
					
					 He stated that the U.S. and south Korean forces kicked off the joint military maneuvers with the largest-ever armed forces and all kinds of nuclear strategic assets involved, frantically conducting drills for "beheading operation" aimed at "removal of the headquarters" of a sovereign state and "special operation" mainly based on "preemptive strike" aimed to remove nuclear and rocket bases.
					
					 He also denounced the shameless moves of the U.S. to justify their joint military drills while viciously faulting the warning of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army with regard to the reckless "special operation".
					
					 It is the exercise of the DPRK's right to self-defence to counter the U.S. and south Korean forces' moves with its preemptive strike since the U.S. declared that they would remove the supreme headquarters and major strategic bases of the DPRK through "special operation", he said, and went on:
					
					 The present touch-and-go situation of the Korean peninsula clearly shows where all issues come from and that if a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula, the U.S. should be held whole accountable for it as it hurled huge nuclear strategic assets and special operation means, not content with its persistent hostile policy.
					
					 Expressing deep concern about the aggravating situation of the Korean peninsula, those diplomatic representatives noted that they came to have clear understanding of the essence of the present situation and the principled stand of the DPRK.

articles.title: Spanish Ambassador to DPRK Meets Its Officials Concerned
articles.content:
Spanish Ambassador to DPRK Meets Its Officials Concerned
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Spanish ambassador to the DPRK paid a courtesy call on the vice-minister in charge of Europe of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK and met with officials concerned of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of External Economic Relations and the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea on Tuesday and Wednesday.
					 Both sides exchanged views on the present situation on the Korean peninsula and discussed the issue for developing the bilateral relations.
					
					 The DPRK side informed the ambassador of the DPRK's self-defensive measures for coping with the moves of the U.S. driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into the worst situation by introducing lots of nuclear strategic assets and staging the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises aiming at the "beheading operation" and "occupation of Pyongyang" together with south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The ambassador expressed deep concern over the situation on the Korean peninsula bringing to the brink of a war and hoped that the tension would be defused to provide favorable environment for the cooperative relations between the DPRK and European countries.

articles.title: Greetings to People's Party for Reconstruction and Democracy of DR Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to People's Party for Reconstruction and Democracy of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the National Executive Committee of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo on Thursday on the occasion of its 15th founding anniversary.
					 The message said that the WPK was glad to see the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo registering many successes in its work for achieving the national unity and the country's stability and socio-economic development while weathering all sorts of challenges and difficulties.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in interests of the peoples of the two countries in the future, too, the message sincerely wished the party bigger success in its work for strengthening it and achieving the country's independent development and prosperity.

articles.title: Exhibition of Works on Juche Idea Visited
articles.content:
Exhibition of Works on Juche Idea Visited
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Many people in the DPRK visit the Exhibition of Works on the Juche Idea on the occasion of the 35th publication anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea".
					 More than 380,000 servicepersons, civilians from all walks of life, youth and students, foreigners and overseas compatriots have visited the exhibition from 2011.

articles.title: Energy-saving, Green Architectural Technologies Applied to Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Energy-saving, Green Architectural Technologies Applied to Ryomyong Street
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Various energy-saving and green architectural technologies have been applied in Ryomyong Street now under construction in Pyongyang in keeping with the trend of the world.
					 Drives for introducing a passive solar heating technology and a solar-guided lightning system are coming to a close.
					
					 Interior walls of the dwelling houses and some public catering outlets were painted with internal paints mixed with anion-generating paints.
					
					 Every construction unit completed the tree planting and the greening of the surface of walls, and the construction of the hydroponic greenhouses on roofs is progress apace.
					
					 A drive to apply the technology of using rainwater to watering the greenhouses and green areas on roofs is being pushed forward.

articles.title: High-pitched Drive for Catfish Breeding in DPRK
articles.content:
High-pitched Drive for Catfish Breeding in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A high-pitched drive for breeding catfish is being conducted in the DPRK.
					 Many catfish farms have been built in recent years. 
					
					 The Samchon Catfish Farm has turned into a world-level large-scale fish farm in Samchon County, South Hwanghae Province. Samchon County is famous for hot springs.
					
					 The farm has 16 large catfish ponds. An integrated production system was established at the farm to measure and control the water temperature and oxygen content and to automatically adjust water supply and the amount of food.
					
					 The Pyongyang Catfish Farm has put catfish farming on a scientific, intensive and industrial basis at a higher level.
					
					 Jagang Province built 1 000 square meters of greenhouse-style catfish farms in cities and counties, and Hochon County of South Hamgyong Province 60,000 square meters of a catfish farm.
					
					 Tokchon City and Sinyang County, South Phyongan Province also built catfish farms.
					
					 Meanwhile, drives to set the catfish production capacity in a scientific way and build modern catfish farms are being pushed forward across the country. The work for realizing the local production of fish breeding facilities is also progressing apace. This proves the validity of the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of fish farming.

articles.title: U.S. Reckless Moves for Preemptive Attack under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Reckless Moves for Preemptive Attack under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are getting ever more desperate in their moves for a preemptive attack on the DPRK despite the repeated warnings of the Korean People's Army.
					 They let total of 20 F-35Bs take off the Iwakuni marine base in Japan ten times for madcap drills for precision strike under the simulated conditions of hitting major targets of the DPRK during the period between March 21 and 24.
					
					 On March 28 and 29 they let formations of B-1B nuclear strategic bombers fly in the sky above south Korea to conduct nuclear bomb-dropping drills.
					
					 B-1Bs from the Anderson U.S. Air Force base on Guam flew into the sky above the East Sea of Korea at mid-night for a madcap rehearsal for hitting targets in the DPRK.
					
					 It is the first time that a series of nuclear bomb-dropping drills were staged at night with nuclear strategic bombers involved.
					
					 In the latter half of March the U.S. imperialists staged such drills four times from different places, a vivid revelation of their sinister intention to make a surprise strike at the DPRK in different directions.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers should remember the warning made by the KPA for retaliatory counteraction.

articles.title: Ground Jet Test of Korean-style High-Thrust Engine Is Historic Event: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ground Jet Test of Korean-style High-Thrust Engine Is Historic Event: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the scientists and technicians in the field of national defense of the DPRK newly manufactured Korean-style high-thrust engine better than other engines of the last period with their own efforts and by relying on their own techniques and succeeded in its test at the first go under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Thursday in an article says this marked a great event of historical significance as it declared a new birth of the Juche-based rocket industry that has definitely turned into a development-and-creation-oriented industry, and provided a scientific and technological foundation matchable to the world-level satellite delivery capability in the field of outer space development.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The first H-bomb test was conducted at the beginning of last year to be followed by test-fires of different offensive means and the explosion test of nuclear warhead and the work for the preparations for the test-fire of the ICBM has reached the last stage. This has startled the world and stroke terror into the enemies' hearts.
					
					 Kim Jong Un consolidated the arsenal of Songun revolution by pursuing outstanding leadership with pluck of Mt Paektu and far-sighted wisdom.
					
					 Otherwise, Korea might have suffered nuclear war disaster more than a hundred of times and the existence of the nation would not have been possible.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists introduced nuclear strategic assets to south Korea on a large scale to escalate the tension by staging the largest-ever war drills against the north. But it is none other than a bluff to cover up their uneasiness and terror in the face of the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence and placate their poor stooges.
					
					 The best way for the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces to avoid the DPRK's annihilating blow is to exercise prudence and self-control, not provoking the dignity and security of the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Traitors Slammed for Going Reckless in Cooperating with Outsiders for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Traitors Slammed for Going Reckless in Cooperating with Outsiders for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Recently talking about "strengthened cooperation over the nuclear issue against the north", Chief of the Security Office of Chongwadae Kim Kwan Jin flew to the U.S. and was closeted with the White House security adviser to stage the anti-DPRK confab.
					 Raising a hue and cry over the "nuclear and missile threats from the north and change of security circumstances", Ri Sun Jin, chairman of the south Korean puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff, talked with the chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff on the telephone, calling for counteraction,.
					
					 And the gentries of the puppet Foreign Ministry at the talks with the U.S. chief delegate of the six-party talks of the U.S. Department of State in Seoul called for "close cooperation over the policy toward the north", and puppet Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se toured different countries of Asia soliciting for "cooperation in shaping policy toward the north".
					
					 The sinister intention of the puppet group of traitors is aimed to make the inter-Korean relations that they deteriorated irrecoverable after the regime change in south Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces are making desperate efforts to get cooperation in escalating confrontation with the DPRK while clinging to the coattails of outside forces, but this will bring to light the miserable wretched nature of stooges who suffered shame for dancing to the tune of Park Geun Hye only to be forsaken even by their U.S. master. 
					
					 The racket kicked off by the group of traitors is intolerable as it is an open challenge to the mind-set of the participants in the candlelight actions and unpardonable mockery of the desire of all Koreans for the country's reunification.
					
					 No matter how recklessly the remnants of the Park Geun Hye group may go in depending on outside forces while talking about "cooperation against the north", being unaware of where they stand, this will only prompt their doom.

articles.title: No Force Can Check Advance of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Force Can Check Advance of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK succeeded in the ground jet test of new-type high-thrust engine manufactured totally in its own style, thus working another miracle to be specially recorded in the history of the defence industry building, Rodong Sinmun on Thursday says in a commentary.
					 The DPRK made great progress in developing Juche-oriented weapons which strike terror into the enemies, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It fully demonstrated the tremendous national power and spirit of Juche Korea again. This was a slap on the faces of U.S. authorities getting frantic with the anti-DPRK moves, crying out for escalating sanctions and pressure during their foreign junkets and still failing to come to their senses.
					
					 Having inveterate repugnancy toward the DPRK, the U.S. has done everything possible to stifle it so far.
					
					 The U.S. calculated the DPRK would not hold out any longer but yield to its pressure. This was, however, a daydream.
					
					The U.S. is now busy staging war exercises to invade the DPRK with more than 300,000 troops, nuclear carrier, nuclear strategic bombers and all other nuclear strategic assets involved, but this muscle flexing only precipitates their final ruin.
					
					 Neither storm nor stress can ever block the advance of the DPRK. It has nothing to fear as it has grown stronger despite difficulties and ordeals.
					
					 No force on earth can check the advance of the army and people of the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the distinguished leadership of the great illustrious commander.

articles.title: New Society for Peaceful Reunification Called for
articles.content:
New Society for Peaceful Reunification Called for 
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Europe released an appeal on March 28 calling for building a new society where the Koreans can achieve peaceful reunification in the spirit of candlelight actions, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 The appeal recalled that Koreans in Germany have struggled for the democratization of the south Korean society and the peaceful reunification of the country for more than four decades since they conducted the democratic movement against the Park Chung-Hee's military dictatorial regime in the 1970s.
					
					 It called for liquidating political, social and economic evils that had persisted for over half a century and building a harmonious society for the people by dint of candlelight actions.
					
					 It said that the way for the nation to live is only national reconciliation and reunification, stressing the need to rapidly press forward the repeal of "Security Law," south-north reconciliation and visits, removal of the danger of war and shaping of line of independent reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution Condemned for Reading Park's Face
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution Condemned for Reading Park's Face
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on March 28 said detention of Park Geun Hye is first step for rooting out evils.
					 The editorial said that it is natural to put Park, the chief culprit of scandals, in custody in the light of not only the people's feelings but also legal principles. However the prosecution has conducted an investigation into Park's scandals, reading her face, it added.
					
					 The people will not pardon any longer the forces who cover up their crimes through procrastination and excuses and their servants, it warned.

articles.title: Serious Air Pollution in S. Korea
articles.content:
Serious Air Pollution in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Air pollution is getting serious in south Korea, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The level of air pollution in Seoul is second among the world major cities.

articles.title: Stop to Illegal THAAD Deployment Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Illegal THAAD Deployment Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other civic organizations of south Korea held the 179th peace and disarmament rally outside the puppet defense ministry building on March 28, demanding stop to the THAAD deployment.
					 Speakers said at the rally that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities were busy deploying THAAD in an illegal way.
					
					 They called on the people from all walks of life to join in the struggle for stopping the THAAD deployment that threatens peace and security.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography and Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Hungary
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography and Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Hungary
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, (the Day of the Sun), posted on its website on March 21 the brief biography of Kim Il Sung and "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People", the work of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il during their lifetime.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly preserving and glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Seminar on Exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Held in Russia
articles.content:
Seminar on Exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il took place in Sankt-Peterburg City, Russia on March 19.
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar were works of peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and books introducing the proud reality in the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were figures of organizations for the study of the Juche idea including Mikhail Panchenko, chairman of the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Policy who doubles as general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions; Vadim Kudimin, director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism; Elena Bavichi, chairwoman of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union; and masses and a delegation of the Social Scientists Society of Korea visiting Russia.
					
					 A report and speeches were made there.
					
					 Mikhail Panchenko in his report praised Kim Il Sung as the man of great eminence as he performed the great exploits to shine for a long time in the history of mankind by founding the Juche idea reflecting the aspiration of the popular masses and desire of the era and by building the socialist system of independence, self-reliance and self-defence on the land of the DPRK after frustrating the aggression of foreign forces.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il is an outstanding leader as he provided an eternal foundation for building a socialist power by leading the party, the state and the army of the DPRK to victory.
					
					 Speakers including Vadim Kudimin and Elena Bavichi said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il devoted their lives to the people and brightly lightened the road for realizing independence of the popular masses.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Benin
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A Benin national preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Cotonou on Mar. 13.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the anniversary.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Romania
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A Romanian national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, was formed on Mar. 22.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from Mar. 23 to April 15 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events during the period.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in France
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in France
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A French preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, was formed on Mar. 22.
					 Guy Dupre, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the President's revolutionary career and exploits and organize colorful political and cultural events on the anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Kim Ki Ryong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Kim Ki Ryong
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 30 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kim Ki Ryong, miembro de la junta editorial de Rodong Sinmun quien fue condecorado con las Ordenes Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: RPDC y Malasia publican declaracion conjunta
articles.content:
RPDC y Malasia publican declaracion conjunta
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Las delegaciones de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Malasia hicieron publica el dia 30 la siguiente declaracion conjunta:
					1. Las delegaciones de la RPDC y Malasia sostuvieron hace poco las conversaciones para solucionar los problemas derivados del deceso de un ciudadano de la RPDC en Kuala Lumpur el 13 de febrero de 2017.
					
					2. Ambos paises reafirmaron el deseo de resolver los problemas existentes a base del poderio fundamental de las relaciones bilaterales que fueron desarrolladas desde su establecimiento en 1973.
					
					3. Ambos paises coincidieron en la importancia de la observacion de la Convencion de Viena sobre las Relaciones Diplomaticas y de la implementacion de los articulos contenidos en ella.
					
					4. Puesto que la RPDC ha presentado todos los documentos necesarios relacionados con el cuerpo del fallecido de parte de su familia, Malasia acordo facilitar la transferencia del cuerpo a la familia del fallecido en la RPDC.
					
					5. Ambos paises acordaron cancelar la medida de prohibicion de viaje impuesta a los ciudadanos de la otra parte y garantizar la seguridad de ellos en los respectivos territorios. Esto permitira a los 9 malasios permanentes en Pyongyang volver a su pais y a los ciudadanos de la RPDC en Kuala Lumpur salir de Malasia.
					
					6. La importancia de las relaciones bilaterales ha sido reafirmada. Al respecto, ambos paises acordaron discutir positivamente la reintroduccion del sistema de no visado y trabajar para desarrollar en el nivel mas alto las relaciones bilaterales.

articles.title: EE.UU. sera responsable del estallido de guerra, insiste vocero de cancilleria coreana
articles.content:
EE.UU. sera responsable del estallido de guerra, insiste vocero de cancilleria coreana 
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que EE.UU. lleva mas a la extremidad la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana convirtiendo lo blanco en lo negro, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion.
					El portavoz refirio a que el vocero del Departamento de Estado norteamericano califico el dia 27 de "acto provocativo" y "palabra incitante" la advertencia del portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea dada a las "operaciones especiales" de los imperialistas yanquis y la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					La susodicha advertencia es la justa medida autodefensiva para castigar a los provocadores inauditos en las condiciones en que la situacion se llego a la etapa mas intolerable, asi aclara el portavoz de la cancilleria coreana y continua:
					
					Es muy clara la intencion de EE.UU. que desarrolla los ejercicios militares conjuntos movilizando cientos de miles de efectivos agresivos y las propiedades estrategicas nucleares y perpetra el entrenamiento de "operacion especial" dando prioridad a la "operacion de descabezamiento" para "eliminar la Direccion" del Estado soberano y la operacion de "golpe preventivo" para destruir las bases nucleares y de cohetes.
					
					Son absurdos los disparates de EE.UU. para justificar sus alborotos militares hablando de la transparencia.
					
					Esas tonterias acerca de la transparencia devienen las palabras violentas que muestran el intento de perpetrar abiertamente el pillaje.
					
					En nuestro pais con estrecha profundidad estrategica el resuelto ataque preventivo es el unico remedio para defenderse a si mismo deteniendo el inesperado ataque preventivo de las sofisticadas propiedades estrategicas nucleares y las unidades de operaciones especiales de EE.UU.
					
					Si estalla la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, su responsabilidad recaera, sin hacer caso de quien dio el ataque preventivo, a EE.UU. que perpetro incesantemente la politica hostil a Corea y provoco a su contraparte introduciendo muchas propiedades estrategicas nucleares y los medios de operaciones especiales.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC rechaza sanciones financieras de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC rechaza sanciones financieras de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por un reportero de la ACNC en relacion con que EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles desarrollan de manera frenetica los alborotos de sancion financiera contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 29 la respuesta siguiente:
					En la sesion plenaria de la Organizacion Internacional de Supervision Financiera, efectuada en febrero en Paris de Francia, EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles volvieron a definir a la RPDC como "blanco de contramedida" para impedir las transacciones monetarias entre la RPDC y otros paises y obligo a la "Sociedad Mundial de Telecomunicacion Financiera  Interbancaria" (SWIFT, en ingles) a tomar las medidas de prohibicion del servicio de comunicaciones financieras sobre los bancos de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. aprobo en la Camara de Representantes del Congreso el "proyecto de ley para recrudecer las sanciones referentes a las negociaciones con el Norte de Corea" modificando la "ley de recrudecimiento de las sanciones y las politicas sobre el Norte de Corea de 2016". Tambien, al inventar las farsas absurdas, dice que impondra las sanciones individuales a los bancos y empresas que hacen negocios con la RPDC.
					
					Esta campana anti-RPDC que en los ultimos dias desarrollan EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles no pasa de ser los ultimos esfuerzos de quienes perdieron la iniciativa en la confrontacion politica y militar con la RPDC.
					
					Al decir la verdad, los bancos coreanos no tienen relaciones con SWIFT desde hace mucho tiempo.
					
					La definicion del "blanco de contramedida" deviene un acto injusto de la organizacion internacional de supervision financiera, segun la presion de pais norteamericano.
					
					La RPDC hace todo lo que debe hacer bajo el ordenado sistema estatal contra el lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo, establecido segun las normas internacionales
					
					Las sanciones individuales que EE.UU. quiere hacer en virtud de su ley tropiezan con el rechazo internacional, siendo una violacion flagrante de la ley internacional.
					
					Todos los hechos arriba mencionados muestran fehacientemente que los freneticos alborotos de EE.UU. para dar las sanciones financieras a la RPDC persiguen el intento de manchar la imagen exterior de este pais asiatico y crear mas el ambiente internacional de sancion y presion anti-RPDC.
					
					Por mucho que EE.UU. y sus satelites se valen de las sanciones de la ONU, las individuales y otras maneras cobardes para quitar las armas nucleares de la RPDC, revelaran mas la injusticia e inmoralidad de sus sanciones y no frenaran la marcha de la RPDC para construir lo mas pronto posible la potencia socialista tomando mas fuertemente la espada nuclear y enarbolando la bandera de autofortalecimiento.

articles.title: Inaugurado el remodelado Museo de la Revolucion Coreana
articles.content:
Inaugurado el remodelado Museo de la Revolucion Coreana
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el Museo de la Revolucion Coreana, remodelado magnificamente como gran centro de educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias. 
					El museo donde se hace compendio de la historia revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il deviene el sosten ideo-espiritual para los militares y habitantes coreanos que glorifican siempre la idea y las proezas revolucionarias de los grandes Lideres y adelantan la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Constituye ademas el patrimonio mas valioso de la Corea del Sol.
					
					En ese lugar saltan a la vista las estatuas de pie de colores del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Se exhibieron en mas de 100 salas decenas de miles de objetos y datos, entre ellos miles son nuevamente expuestos por orden tematico y cronologico, de modo que confirmaran la tradicion y la historia de la revolucion coreana que recorrio el trayecto victorioso y glorioso bajo la guia de los grandes Lideres. Las salas fueron acondicionadas solemnemente para demostrar historica y generalmente la vida y proezas revolucionarias de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu. 
					
					Nuevas maquetas y miniaturas y los demas objetos exhibidos se han hecho garantizando la visualidad y el caracter estereografico y mejorando la forma de muestra y los efectos de iluminacion.
					
					Se ven los panoramas que dejan conocer los sucesos y hechos de la epoca correspondiente. 
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar el dia 30 con la participacion de Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Ro Tu Chol y otros cuadros del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, los organismos del poder, las entidades de masas, los ministerios, los organos centrales, los organos del partido y el poder, las fabricas y empresas de esta capital, los funcionarios y constructores de las unidades participantes en la reconstruccion, los funcionarios y empleados del museo. 
					
					La palabra de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y vicepresidente del CC del PTC.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes escucharon las explicaciones generales sobre el museo remozado y pasaron revista a varias salas.

articles.title: Encuentro de informacion de situacion para los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales en la RPDC
articles.content:
Encuentro de informacion de situacion para los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales en la RPDC
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que se creo en la Peninsula Coreana la grave situacion de guerra debido a los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos y los entrenamientos de la "operacion especial" de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea organizo el dia 30 el encuentro de informacion para los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales acreditados en la RPDC.
					En la ocasion, el vicecanciller coreano Sin Hong Chol informo la situacion creada en los ultimos dias en la Peninsula Coreana y hablo de la posicion de principios de la RPDC al respecto.
					
					El revelo con datos detallados de que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos desarrollan los ejercicios militares conjuntos movilizando las fuerzas armadas de maxima envergadura sin precedente y todo tipo de las propiedades estrategicas nucleares y perpetran freneticamente el entrenamiento de "operacion especial" que da prioridad a la "operacion de descabezamiento" para "eliminar la Direccion" del Estado soberano y la operacion de "ataque preventivo" para destruir las bases nucleares y de cohetes.
					
					Y condeno las maniobras descaradas de EE.UU. que trata de justificar sus simulacros militares cuestionando perversamente la advertencia del portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dada frente a la imprudente "operacion especial" de los imperialistas yanquis y la banda titere surcoreana, y aclaro que el intento de la RPDC de responder con el golpe preventivo deviene el muy natural ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa porque EE.UU. declaro que eliminara con la "operacion especial" la Direccion Maxima y las principales bases estrategicas de Corea.
					
					La actual situacion de la Peninsula Coreana muestra claramente el origen de todos los problemas, subrayo el vicecanciller y continuo que si estalla la guerra en esta peninsula, su responsabilidad recaera a EE.UU. que perpetro incesantemente la politica hostil a Corea y provoco a su contraparte introduciendo muchas propiedades estrategicas nucleares y los medios de operaciones especiales.
					
					Los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales en la RPDC expresaron gran preocupacion por la grave situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana y aclararon que se llegaron al criterio exacto sobre la esencia de la situacion actual y la posicion de principios de la RPDC.

articles.title: Sesionado el 4o pleno del octavo periodo del CC de la UTAC
articles.content:
Sesionado el 4o pleno del octavo periodo del CC de la UTAC
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en esta capital el 4o pleno del octavo periodo del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea.
					En la ocasion tomaron parte los miembros y funcionarios del CC de la UTAC y fue discutido el problema de organizacion.
					
					En esta reunion, el presidente Ri Myong Gil fue removido de su cargo y Kim Chang Yop fue elegido como nuevo presidente.
